0.name: kyle
0.memory: The day we met changed my life forever. It was when I met my best friend & my soul mate. It will remain in my heart forever.

1.name: kyle
1.memory: That night when I came to see you on campus and we kissed under a street lamp was so magical!

2.name: kyle
2.memory: Our trip to Banff was so amazing. It was so nice to get away with you, and I can't wait for more amazing trips we will take together

3.name: kyle
3.memory: The surprise party you threw me made me feel so happy and special, it was hands down my favorite birthday, and it was all thanks to you

4.name: kyle
4.memory: Our first kiss was so intense, it felt like fireworks were going off inside my head!

5.name: kyle
5.memory: The last Halloween party we had was one of my favorite parties, and we had so much fun! (Even though I could not remember quite a bit of it)
